description: Used to send and receive updates about GNodeInstances. One of the layers of abstraction connecting a GNode with a running app in a Docker container.

ReasonableUnixTimeS.description: Integer reflecting unix time seconds between 1970 and 3000

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.

AlgoAddressStringFormat.description: String of length 32, characters are all base32 digits.

oneOf.title: Pending
oneOf.description: Has been created by the World, but has not yet finished provisioning

oneOf.title: Active
oneOf.description: Active in its GridWorks world. If the GNodeInstance has an actor, that actor is communicating

StrategyName000.name: strategy.name.000
StrategyName000.description: Used to assign code to run a particular GNodeInstance

oneOf.title: NoActor
oneOf.description: Assigned to GNodes that do not have actors

oneOf.title: AtnHeatPumpWithBoostStore
oneOf.description: GridWorks strategy for an AtomicTNode representing a type of heat pump storage heating system

GNode.title: The GNode represented by the Gni

Strategy.title: Used to determine the code running in a GNode actor application

SupervisorContainerId.title: The Id of the docker container where the Gni runs

StartTimeUnixS.title: When the gni starts representing the GNode
StartTimeUnixS.description: Specifically, when the Status changes from Pending to Active. Note that this is time in the GNode's World, which may not be real time if it is a simulation.

EndTimeUnixS.title: When the gni stops representing the GNode
EndTimeUnixS.description: Specifically, when the Status changes from Active to Done.
